p: Importantly, this work presents predictive models designed with the goal of using covariates to forecast an outcome variable; namely, ZIKV cases. This is distinct from explanatory modeling, which seeks to understand the causal relationships between covariates and outcome variables [ 63]. In this study, we do not pursue such causal inference. Therefore, while zika tweets serve useful in predicting ZIKV cases, we do not make claims about the relationship between tweets and ZIKV cases.
